settings.text: View our most frequently asked questions about the PetSnowy

settings.h3: If I need to return my PetSnowy product, how do I get a refund
settings.text:
PetSnowy products purchased directly through petsnowy.com may be returned within thirty (30) days of receipt for a full refund. Kindly note that there will be shipping costs.
If you shop on a different website. Please comply with the website policy. 
If you’ve purchased your PetSnowy product through a third-party retailer, you must coordinate the return directly with that retailer.
Click to our Return & Refunds page (超链接到https://www.petsnowy.com/pages/returns-refunds) for more details.

settings.h3: How do I obtain a Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) number?
settings.text: We offer a return shipping service. We can provide you with a return shipping label and the shipping cost will be deducted from your refund. The specific shipping cost varies by region, please contact our support team at: support@petsnowy.com for more details.

settings.h3: Do I need to clean my PetSnowy product before returning it?
settings.text: Before returning your PetSnowy product, please give it a good cleaning. You can watch a  video(超链接到猫砂盆清洗视频) on how to clean the SNOW⁺ for return.(视频还没有这句可以You....for return可以不加上) Please note that products returned in an unclean state within the 30-day trial period may incur a $75 cleaning fee deducted from your refund.

settings.h3: when will  I receive my refund?
settings.text: After our warehouse receives your return and checks that everything is fine, we will apply for a refund for you. Refunds will be issued based on the payment method used to make the contribution. It may take 3-5 business days to process for US payment methods, or 7-10 business days for international payment methods.

settings.h3: What is your return policy on all items other than the litter box?
settings.text: For products such as water fountains, pet feeders, pet toy, accessories, and consumable items (litter bags, fragrance boxes, water filters, etc.), you can apply for a return as long as they are in brand new, unopened condition. Opened water fountains, pet feeders, pet toy, accessories, and consumable items (litter bags, fragrance boxes, water filters, etc.) are non-returnable. The buyer is responsible for covering the expenses associated with the return shipping.
